fields.description:
Privacy Notice: For term submission purposes we request business contact information only, not personal information.
    Your business email, and any other business contact information that you enter, will be stored in a publicly-accessible
    web site in support of CDISC term submission tracking. CDISC personnel may contact you.

sections.name: Term Information
sections.instructions: Fill in the following fields as appropriate. For multiple term submissions, please click on and download the Excel file CDISC Controlled Terminology Multiple Term Request Spreadsheet and add on your name and request date to the end of the file name. Email this completed file to NciEvsCdiscHelp@mail.nih.gov. In addition, please submit a CDISC New Term Request form indicating "File emailed separately" in Additional Information.

fields.name: CDISC Code List
fields.description: Note to user: CDASH and SDTM Terminology are the same and are contained within the SDTM codelists in the drop down list.
